text: Jack Smith (born 9 July 1999, on the Gold Coast) is an Australian racing driver who currently races in the Virgin Australia Supercars Championship, driving for Brad Jones Racing in the No. 4 Holden ZB Commodore. Smith made his Supercars Championship debut as a wildcard entry at the 2019 Tasmania SuperSprint for Brad Jones Racing. ==Career results== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! Season !
